oai_dc:dc.dc:title: TRANSFORMATION OF WAVE GROUPS AND ACCOMPANYING LONG WAVES IN SHALLOW WATER
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mizuguchi, M.
Matsutate, H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: shallow water
wave transformation
wave group
long waves
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Interaction of short waves modulation and long waves evolution is studied. Existence of free long waves is taken into account. Laboratory experiment and numerical simulation with coupled equations are performed. Mechanism of the modulation is discussed. The distance, below which the modulation may be neglected, is evaluated.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 26 (1998): Proceedings of 26th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Copenhagen, Denmark, 1998.
